title: Create Core Task Manager Script
description: Implement scripts/task-manager.py with core functions for task validation, sync operations, parent auto-completion, dependency checking, and metrics calculation. Must handle task breakdown operations including creation of new subtask JSON files with proper parent references and status management.
completion_notes: Implemented comprehensive task-manager.py with all core functions including: validate_task_schema(), sync_task_overview(), check_parent_completion(), validate_dependencies(), calculate_task_metrics(), create_subtask(), handle_breakdown(), bulk_update_status(). Added CLI interface for testing. Created requirements.txt with all necessary dependencies.
notes: Core functions: validate_task_schema(), sync_task_overview(), check_parent_completion(), validate_dependencies(), calculate_task_metrics(), create_subtask(), handle_breakdown(). Must support both single task operations and bulk operations for efficiency.
assumptions: JSON schema validation using jsonschema library
File operations use pathlib for cross-platform compatibility
Atomic file operations to prevent corruption
decision_rationale: Task manager is the foundation script that all other operations depend on. Priority on reliable JSON operations and parent/subtask relationship management.
